comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model CheckpointFacilityType adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/CheckpointFacilityType/schema.json
description: Property. Information that describes the classification for a Checkpoint in an Airport. Values are: Security Screening, Customs.
